channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Palantir’s stock surges as AI drives a further acceleration in growth
From ‘nauseously optimistic’ to ‘headline stress disorder,’ how to deal with your election anxiety
item.description: You're not alone: 77% of Americans are stressed about the future of the country, finds a new poll. Here's how to calm down.

item.title: U.S. stocks finish lower ahead of Election Day
Bond-market ‘vigilantes’ appear to be in ‘driver’s seat’ before election
Berkshire Hathaway is dumping Apple stock and building its cash stockpile to record highs because Warren Buffett believes the government will raise capital gains taxes soon
item.description: The company’s cash and short-term treasuries now outweigh the market value of its equities.

item.title: These billionaires and groups have spent over $160 million on one Montana race
Wall Street’s Trump trade unravels after a shock poll dented his election odds
item.description: The dollar, Treasury yields, and Bitcoin fell on Monday after a closely watched poll over the weekend showed Harris with a lead in Iowa.

item.title: Over 60% of homeowners go into debt for renovations they wish they hadn’t done, study finds
item.description: About 1 in 9 homeowners disliked their post-renovation home, and nearly half of renovators said they liked their home better before they renovated.

item.title: Some traders see opportunity in Wall Street’s election-related anxiety
Elon Musk joins a chorus of conservatives turning the euthanized ‘Peanut the squirrel’ into a symbol of ‘government overreach’
item.description: The internet-famous squirrel was seized by the New York Department of Environmental Conservation Wednesday over safety and legal concerns.
